title: Congressional power to stimulate the economy

content.question: Which of the following enumerated powers would permit Congress to stimulate the economy by hiring unemployed citizens?

choices.label: The power to create immigration policies
The power to regulate interstate commerce
The power to pass a federal budget

content.answer: The power to pass a federal budget

topic.text: 2.1: Congress: The Senate and the House of Representatives

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
